targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum(rate(originx_thread_polaris_nanoseconds_bucket{container_id=~"$container_id", tid_key=~"$tid", type="cpu", cluster_id=~"$cluster_id"}[$interval]))  by (container_id, tid, vmrange))

panels.title: Polaris Metrics (Only when single thread is selected)

list.definition:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cluster_id
list.query:
SELECT DISTINCT scope_id AS __value, 
CASE 
  WHEN c.name != '' THEN c.name
  ELSE scope_id
END AS __text
FROM data_scope 
LEFT JOIN clusters c ON scope_id  = c.id
WHERE type = 'cluster'
